channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump and Johnson are likely doomed in their attempts to thwart an Epstein files vote
item.description: Rep. Thomas Massie's (R-Ky.) discharge petition on releasing the Epstein files is all but certain to force a House vote by the end of this month — eve...

item.title: Israel conducts airstrike in Qatar to assassinate Hamas officials
item.description: Israel conducted an air strike on Tuesday to try and assassinate Hamas leaders in Doha, two Israeli officials told Axios. Why it matters: The assassin...

item.title: MAGA dreams of greater power grabs on a shrinking timetable
item.description: MAGA activists are urging President Trump to tear down the remaining guardrails on his authority, dreaming of bigger, faster power grabs than the swee...

item.title: What we know about Trump's relationship with Epstein
item.description: Chart: Axios Visuals President Trump 's alleged submission to a birthday book compiled for Jeffrey Epstein was released on Monday after the president ...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Slow, hard AI
item.description: Julie Sweet , CEO of consulting giant Accenture, has a rare line of sight into the AI ambitions and worries of the world's biggest companies. Her unva...

item.title: Pushing Democratic ‘reset,’ a religious Texas lawmaker runs for Senate
item.description: State Rep. James Talarico on Tuesday entered his party’s primary for the seat currently held by GOP Sen. John Cornyn.

item.title: Senators ramp up pressure on Trump to abandon threats to send troops into U.S. cities
item.description: Democratic senators are filing a brief in support of California Gov. Gavin Newsom’s suit against the Trump administration.

item.title: Judge throws out charges against GOP would-be electors in Michigan
item.description: The dismissal of the charges is a victory for Trump and his allies and a blow to Michigan’s Democratic attorney general.

item.title: For Trump, latest Epstein disclosures bring continued political pain
item.description: The release of more documents about Jeffrey Epstein, including a bawdy drawing that Trump denied making, has prolonged the political problem for the p...

item.title: Democrats pick members for new GOP-led committee on Jan. 6 Capitol attack
item.description: The subcommittee will have subpoena power and is authorized to conduct a complete investigation of the events in 2021, when a pro-Trump mob stormed th...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
